00037  public function messagesCurrentAction($action ='viewForum')
00038  {
00039 
00040    $action=$action;
00041 
00042    $method = $this->__getMethod($action);
00043 
00044 
00045    return $this->$method();
00046 
00047  }
00048  private function __validAction(& $action)
00049  {
00050    if (method_exists($this, "__".$action)) {
00051      return TRUE;
00052    } else {
00053      return FALSE;
00054    }
00055  }
00056  private function __getMethod( $action)
00057  {
00058      if ($this->__validAction($action)) {
00059          return "__" . $action;
00060      } else {
00061          return "__actionError";
00062      }
00063  }
00064  private function __actionError()
00065  {
00066      //Get action from query string
00067      $action=$this->getParam('action');
00068      $this->setVar('str', "<h3>"
00069        . $this->objLanguage->insertTextFromConfigFile("mod_hosportal_unrecognized")
00070        ." : ". $action . "</h3>");
00071      return 'dump_tpl.php';
00072  }

00702  private function __deletereply()
00703  {
00704     // deleteSingleReply($id);
00705      $idSubjectMatter = $this->getParam('idSubjectMatter');
00706        $id_for_delete = $this->getParam('id');
00707        $commentDataForDelete = $this->objDBComments->listSingle($id_for_delete);
00708        $title_for_delete = $commentDataForDelete[0]["title"];
00709        $this->objDBComments->deleteSingleReply($id_for_delete);
00710        //$this->objDBreplies->deleteSingle($id_for_delete);
00711    // $this->objDBComments->deleteSingle($id_for_delete);
00712   $allComments = $this->objDBComments->listAll();
00713        foreach($allComments as $thisComment)
00714            {
00715 
00716    //Store the values of the array in variables
00717    $id = $thisComment["id"];
00718    //$userid = $thisComment["userid"];
00719    $replytitle = $thisComment["title"];
00720    $comments = $thisComment["commenttxt"];
00721    //$modified = $thisComment["modified"];
00722    $unreplied = $thisComment["unreplied"];
00723    $noofreplies = $thisComment["replies"];
00724 
00725    if (($replytitle == $title_for_delete) && ($noofreplies>0))
00726        {
00727        $noofreplies = $noofreplies - 1;
00728 //if (($no_of_replies ==0 & $unreplied == true)||($no_of_replies>0 & $unreplied == FALSE))
00729 
00730          $this->objDBComments->updateSingleOriginalMessage($id, $replytitle, $comments,$unreplied,$noofreplies);
00731                // $this->setVar('id', $id);
00732     //return "editadd_tpl.php";
00733                 if (($replytitle == $title_for_delete) && ($noofreplies<1) && ($unreplied == FALSE))
00734            {
00735            $unreplied = true;
00736            $this->objDBComments->updateSingleOriginalMessage($id, $replytitle, $comments,$unreplied,$noofreplies);
00737            }
00738        }
00739 //       else if (($replytitle == $title_for_delete) && ($noofreplies<1) && ($unreplied == FALSE))
00740 //           {
00741 //           $unreplied = true;
00742 //           $this->objDBComments->updateSingle($id, $replytitle, $comments,$unreplied,$noofreplies);
00743 //           }
00744 
00745            }
00746     //Delete the comment
00747 //return "listsingle_tpl.php";
00748            return   $this->nextAction("viewSingleMessages",array('idSubjectMatter'=>$idSubjectMatter));
00749              //return   $this->nextAction("view");
00750    // return "listall_tpl.php";
00751 
00752  }
